boot: Download EasyUEFI and rebuild EFI System Partition. Use patcher if trial expired.
secure: BIOS -> Security/Boot -> Disable Secure Boot -> Save (F10)
ban: Win+R -> %appdata% -> Delete: LEX_2_, LEX_2_D, LEX_2_U, LEX SEED
inject: Run as admin, disable antivirus, use windowed mode, restart game+tool
detect:
Use legit accounts, don't be obvious, take breaks, avoid streaming.
You are very unlikely to get banned unless you use money options.
prereq:
1. Install Visual C++: https://aka.ms/vs/17/release/vc_redist.x64.exe
2. Make sure WebView2 and Microsoft Edge are installed.
3. Right-click launcher.exe -> Properties -> Unblock checkbox -> Apply.
error3:
For Error -3 (Data Directory):
Run CMD and enter: icacls "%USERPROFILE%\Lexis" /grant Everyone:(F) /t /c /q
error4:
For Error -4 (Blank Screen):
1. Try deleting the %USERPROFILE%/Lexis/Launcher folder.
2. If that fails, reinstall WebView2: https://superuser.com/a/1751710
integrity:
To disable Memory Integrity:
1. Settings > Privacy & Security > Windows Security > Device Security.
2. Click 'Core Isolation details'.
3. Toggle 'Memory Integrity' to Off and restart your PC.
gta:
For GTA Menu Issues:
1. Make sure BattlEye is enabled.
2. Try loading the menu BEFORE opening the game.
3. Delete FSL if present.
reset:
General Reset Steps:
1. Delete any %APPDATA%/LEX_x files.
2. Delete the %USERPROFILE%/Lexis folder.
3. Verify integrity of game files.
antivirus:
Disable your antivirus. For Windows Defender:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/turn-off-defender-antivirus-protection-in-windows-security-99e6004f-c54c-8509-773c-a4d776b77960
